pros:
Wonderful colleagues.

Some good management training from specialist management trainers.
cons: Sovereign has an investor in people award, and I am sure in some areas this is demonstrated, but not in IT!! It is a pity because it used to be a great place to work but following the departure of some great leadership on the board, the organisation feels to have lost its warmth. Within the IT Department, it has degenerated at an extraordinary pace. Going from having excellent information flow from senior IT management to almost zero. This is causing unrest and disengagement. There is an aggressive change journey ahead, and I appreciate that organisations need to progress but keeping staff totally in the dark is a very poor approach. Direction and leadership is non-existent and staff below the IT Leadership team are not encouraged to contribute at all, this means there is no opportunity to influence change. Instead, overpaid contractors arrive out of nowhere and work in isolation on new processes and act surprised when people are not on board!! There are some fantastic people in the department who have great ideas and would love to be involved in shaping the way forward. Internal promotion is not encouraged, in some cases is actively discouraged, the appraisal process is a complete waste of time and there is no IT training budget at all. So in summary, I wouldn’t recommend it.
